name: Passivhaus masterclass – getting it right
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: A session that covers the right approaches to different aspects of Passivhaus including getting mechanical ventilation with heat recovery right, how to create a well insulated, thermally unbroken envelope and working with the Passivhaus planning package.

presentations.name: Masterclass on ventilation and heat recovery
Masterclass on thermal efficiency
presentations.speakers: Mark Allen, Technical Development Manager, Saint-Gobain Isover
